Plot: Jean-Claude Van Damme gets involved in a bank robbery with hostages situation and reflects about his life during it.
Title: JCVD
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Valérie Bodson, Hervé Sogne, Rock Chen
Writer: Mabrouk El Mechri (scenario), Frédéric Benudis (in collaboration with), Mabrouk El Mechri (adaptation), Frédéric Taddeï (original idea), Vincent Ravalec (original idea), Christophe Turpin
